title: Font tech workshops with Frederik Berlaen, Andy Clymer and Ben Kiel in June
content:
Type@Cooper is offering a series of public font tech workshops this June.  
Registration is open now.

[http://coopertype.org/public-workshops/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130913024316/http:/coopertype.org/public-workshops/ "http://coopertype.org/public-workshops/")

June 1 & 2 Robofont with Frederik Berlaen and Andy Clymer  
June 3 Interpolation with Andy Clymer  
June 4 Kerning with Ben Kiel  
June 5 & 6 Accents with Ben Kiel  
June 8 & 9 Intermediate Python with Andy Clymer  
June 17th Building Open Type Features with Andy Clymer
author: cdiedwardo

comments.content:
Cool.  
What are the chances these will be broadcast?

hhp
I'm in for Robofont and Interpolation.
